SEARCH
Package simula.compiler.declaration

Class SimpleVariableDeclaration

java.lang.Object
simula.compiler.SyntaxClass
simula.compiler.declaration.Declaration
simula.compiler.declaration.SimpleVariableDeclaration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Externalizable, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
LabelDeclaration
public class SimpleVariableDeclaration extends Declaration implements Externalizable
Simple Variable Declaration. 
 
 Syntax:
 
  SimpleVariableDeclaration
        =  Type  TypeList

    TypeList
        =  TypeListElement  { , TypeListElement }

    TypeListElement
        =  Identifier
        |  ConstantElement 
 
    ConstantElement
        =  Identifier  "="  ValueExpression
        |  Identifier  "="  TextExpression
 
        Type ::= BOOLEAN | CHARACTER | INTEGER | REAL | REF(ClassIdentifier) | TEXT
Link to GitHub: Source File.
Author:
SIMULA Standards Group, Ã˜ystein Myhre Andersen
